official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to Daniel Mahr and Thelma M. Mahr, and Nyel H. Moss and Janice L. Moss.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey specified public lands located in the state of Nebraska to certain individuals.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain property to Daniel Mahr and Thelma M. Mahr, and Nyel H. Moss and Janice L. Moss.
